Properties
Key< TextEditorGroup > TextEditorGroupKey = Key<TextEditorGroup>.Empty [get, set]
If the provided TextEditorGroupKey is registered using the ITextEditorService. Then this component will automatically update when the corresponding TextEditorGroup is replaced. A TextEditorGroupKey which is NOT registered using the ITextEditorService can be passed in. Then if the TextEditorGroupKey ever gets registered then this Blazor Component will update accordingly.
